title: 当你发现OP隐身在你背后放了个苦力怕，你的心情是
author: 薛乐仁
txt_content:
1.愤怒
2.开心
3.害怕
4.没反应
5.嫉妒OP能有苦力怕蛋

replies.author: C_T_F_Y
replies.txt_content: 我会觉得OP好无聊

replies.author: 银色十字梦
replies.txt_content: 愉♂悦

replies.author: 璇葎
replies.txt_content: 愤怒！然后退服，这种熊OP，服务器已经完了！

replies.author: mine米
replies.txt_content: 我正愁着没有火药呢

replies.author: Inarin
replies.txt_content:
第一反应，What the hell
第二反应，Farewell my dear world

replies.author: yangoo
replies.txt_content: Envy the OP to have a coolie afraid of eggs

replies.author: rainsojey
replies.txt_content: 以前都是OP在身后放苦力怕的。

银色十字梦 发表于 2016-2-19 12:55
愉♂悦
愉♂悦，为何愉♂悦

replies.author: 天狗
replies.txt_content: 没反应

replies.author: zyjking
replies.txt_content: 哲♂学

replies.author: HAHAML
replies.txt_content: 我穿量子套 怕啥

replies.author: HH_WW
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: JarvisStark76
replies.txt_content: = =我的心情是何等的开心，然后我就开心的挂了

replies.author: MODlover
replies.txt_content:
马上下线
过一会再来

replies.author: MODlover
replies.txt_content:
HAHAML 发表于 2016-2-19 20:10
我穿量子套 怕啥
自定义爆炸威力99的苦力怕
话说这样会卡服的

replies.author: HAHAML
replies.txt_content: 我穿量子套 怕啥
非常开心 可以被炸飞了

replies.author: 史蒂夫杜豫
replies.txt_content: 怕什么重力枪一推就让那苦力怕去月球旅游了，而且一般死亡不掉落吧

replies.author: ItIsEnderman
replies.txt_content: 按下ESC，直接跑，过几分钟再进去……

replies.author: cch2000
replies.txt_content: 就是这样

replies.author: 初见丶LOVE
replies.txt_content: 有这样的OP就基本可以退服了
我觉得楼主好无聊

replies.author: 烦人的ABC
replies.txt_content: 我是腐竹，立马给他撤了呵呵
要是死亡掉落的话   就嫉妒OP能有苦力怕蛋{:10_492:}

replies.author: 吴伟杰
replies.txt_content: 打op然后被打

瞬间/p h
  这个时候就看手速了！

replies.author: w505
replies.txt_content: 不犹豫，选择1
